Add ESP-IDF 5.5.1 compatibility fixes for LCD driver

This commit resolves three compilation errors when building with ESP-IDF 5.5.1:

1. Fix gpio_hal_iomux_func_sel compatibility
   - Map deprecated gpio_hal_iomux_func_sel to esp_rom_gpio_iomux_func_sel
   - Required for ESP-IDF 5.5+ where the HAL function was removed

2. Fix __DECLARE_RCC_ATOMIC_ENV macro compatibility
   - Add compatibility shim for removed RCC atomic environment macro
   - Used internally by lcd_ll_enable_interrupt in ESP-IDF HAL

3. Update deprecated GDMA API to new API
   - Replace gdma_new_channel with gdma_new_ahb_channel
   - Replace GDMA_MAKE_TRIGGER pattern with gdma_connect_config_t
   - Replace gdma_set_transfer_ability with gdma_config_transfer
   - Maintains backward compatibility with ESP-IDF < 5.5 using conditional compilation

All changes use #if ESP_IDF_VERSION >= ESP_IDF_VERSION_VAL(5, 5, 0) guards
to ensure backward compatibility with older ESP-IDF versions.
